  physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It is rectangular and it features a group of people. They are all standing
 except for an infant who is being carried
 and looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. Three children and an infant are present
 together with two ladies and three men. They are standing in front of a building
 on a grass patch.
